alert.note: Alert for Benson; Ramsey (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Benson and southwestern Ramsey Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1145 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brinsmade, or 21 miles west of Devils Lake, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Devils Lake, Camp Grafton, Lakewood Park, Penn, Webster, Brinsmade and Churchs Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
